thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 13 of 2268
thread.title: C Crocker

author: C Crocker
title: C Crocker
text: I was a bit apprehensive about ordering blinds from just seeing a picture online as blinds and curtains are such an important part of dressing a room and cost an arm and a leg! However, the prices at blinds to go were so competitive I took the plunge and ordered them for my lounge. I was bowled over by the quality and value for money. Delighted, I ordered more for another room and received an equally impressive service. When it was the kitchens turn for a total revamp, I had no hesitation and didn't bother looking anywhere else as for quality, value for money, craftsmanship, attention to detail and delivery, they simply cannot be beaten.
